title: What’s on Google TV: Disney+ confirms cheaper ad-supported tier just as NBC ends Hulu deal
content:
Disney+ had a big week with the reveal of upcoming new parental controls and an ad-supported tier coming later this year.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Disney+ confirms cheaper ad-supported tier just as NBC ends Hulu deal appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Just in time for NBC to officially pull the plug on its deal with Hulu, Disney+ has officially confirmed an ad-supported tier is coming soon.
